egg dishes.name: Huevos Rancheros
egg dishes.description: Two eggs, refried beans, ranchero sauce, avocado, and cotija cheese served on a corn tortilla.

egg dishes.name: Classic Eggs Benedict
egg dishes.description: Two poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and hollandaise sauce on an English muffin.

egg dishes.name: Avocado Toast with Fried Egg
egg dishes.description: Toasted sourdough bread, mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a fried egg.

egg dishes.name: Frittata of the Day
egg dishes.description: Chef's daily selection of vegetables, cheese, and eggs baked together. Served with mixed greens.

sandwiches.name: BLTE
sandwiches.description: Bacon, lettuce, tomato, and a fried egg on sourdough bread.

sandwiches.name: Fried Egg Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Two fried eggs, bacon, cheddar cheese, and arugula on a brioche bun.

sandwiches.name: Egg Salad Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Homemade egg salad, lettuce, and tomato on a croissant.

sides.name: Toast
sides.description: Choice of sourdough, wheat, or rye.

signature cocktails.name: Huevos Mary
signature cocktails.description: Our twist on the classic Bloody Mary, made with tequila, tomato juice, hot sauce, and a splash of lime.

signature cocktails.name: Egg-noggin
signature cocktails.description: A creamy, boozy eggnog made with bourbon, brandy, eggs, cream, and nutmeg.

craft beers.name: Eggstra Special IPA
craft beers.description: A hoppy, citrusy India Pale Ale brewed with egg whites.

craft beers.name: Crack an Egg Brown Ale
craft beers.description: A rich and malty brown ale brewed with toasted oats and chocolate malt.

craft beers.name: Sunny Side Up Hefeweizen
craft beers.description: A light and refreshing wheat beer with notes of banana and clove.
